Oh thank you! Thank you! I'll go tell the others!
Schuri... I don't disagree that we should help them...|But we shouldn't promise it.|Especially when we don't know the situation.|It's just us 3, we might not be able to by ourselves.
I get it I get it, just can't resist trying to help
Oh? How did this backwater village get visitors?
Heh? And you seem to know who I am too. Good, saves me time.
One of the leaders of the Crimson Wolves gang|A bunch of low-life murderers and robbers.
Righto girly.|Listen I ain't in the mood at the moment after I ran into some trouble earlier|This ain't nunya business, Back away or else there'll be trouble.
MC, he's injured.|He's probably not even half of what he's normally capable of.|The leaders of the Crimson Wolves gang are impossible to track down.|We can't let him get away!
Hey girly, I ain't deaf you know.|Looks like you ain't that stupid|Tch, screw it, boys get em!
